analysis.description:
HydroCoin.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#460-463) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#462)

HydroCoinPresale.HydroCoinPresale (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#508-522) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(companyTokens,vendorAllocation) (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#518-521)

HydroCoinPresale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#540-561) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol#557-561)

HydroCoinPresale.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-theToken.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_contracts/0xfeed1a53bd53ffe453d265fc6e70dd85f8e993b6.sol)
